base.name: Neill Holloman
base.title: Customer Service & Technology Professional
base.summary: Disciplined and analytical professional with experience in customer service, safety, and technology. Known for initiative, process improvement, and strong communication across retail, logistics, and IT environments.

customerService.title: Customer Service Specialist
customerService.summary: Empathetic and adaptable professional with over a decade in retail and service roles. Skilled at handling customer concerns, boosting satisfaction, and supporting team success through clear communication and problem-solving.

highlights: Demonstrated service excellence by supporting associates and ensuring smooth package processing.
Reorganized Hazmat cage by categorizing materials and researching EPA classifications to improve safety.
Trained associates in Hazmat procedures and contributed to a positive, team-oriented culture.
Advocated for safety and efficiency as a Safety Champion and committee member.
Provided high-quality customer interactions in a fast-paced retail environment.
Ranked #2 in the Pacific Region for customer service surveys.
Sold multiple credit cards through rapport and trust-building, demonstrating strong persuasion skills.
Troubleshot self-checkout systems while ensuring customer satisfaction.
Delivered engaging product demonstrations at Costco, exceeding sales goals.
Educated customers on product benefits and created memorable brand experiences.
Maintained compliance with food safety and sanitation standards.
Balanced quality and efficiency during high-volume service periods.
Delivered friendly, attentive customer service to foster repeat visits.
Worked collaboratively to maintain consistent operations and standards.

experience.company: Down to Earth All Vegetarian Organic & Natural
highlights: Demonstrated customer-first attitude while managing multiple product areas.
Achieved 99% satisfaction rating from Secret Shopper evaluations.
Maintained stock accuracy and store presentation to enhance customer experience.

itSupport.title: IT Support Specialist
itSupport.summary: Analytical professional with experience in ServiceNow, system maintenance, and retail data management. Proven ability to troubleshoot hardware and software issues, implement solutions, and streamline workflows.

highlights: Applied technical troubleshooting in conveyor operations and data tracking systems.
Developed process improvements that enhanced workflow visibility and compliance.
Trained peers on Hazmat documentation and classification systems.
Resolved ESL malfunctions through collaboration with corporate IT.
Audited 1,000â€“2,000 pricing labels monthly to maintain data accuracy.
Managed ordering systems and data synchronization between store and corporate.
Used ServiceNow for ticketing and issue resolution at enterprise scale.
Troubleshot hardware including printers, scales, and POS terminals.
Analyzed product data to reduce waste and improve inventory accuracy.
Trained staff on system operations to ensure continuity of support.

frontendDeveloper.title: Frontend Developer
frontendDeveloper.summary: Self-taught developer with hands-on experience in creating web and desktop applications. Skilled in JavaScript, Vue, and React, with a focus on user experience and efficient data processing.

highlights: Applied technical logic to improve workflow processes similar to frontend data flow optimization.
Collaborated with associates through digital tools like Slack to resolve operational bottlenecks.
Created reports and feedback documentation reflecting data-structured thinking.
Built Shopify Desktop Admin app using Electron, Vue 3, and GraphQL for product data management.
Developed UPT Calculator PWA using React, Tailwind, and IndexedDB for time tracking.
Implemented Material Design and responsive UI components with performance optimization.
Integrated SQLite3 and Dexie for offline data storage and persistence.
Worked with data-driven systems requiring logic comparable to frontend workflows.
Created technical solutions and trained others in digital tools and procedures.

projects.name: Shopify Desktop Admin
projects.description: Electron-based desktop app that fetches and processes Shopify bulk product and variant data.
highlights: Automates bulk product updates and variant management.
Integrates local database for offline-first performance.

projects.name: UPT Calculator PWA
projects.description: Progressive web app designed to help Amazon associates track UPT balances and schedule impacts.
highlights: Implements mobile-first design with offline data storage.
Calculates UPT accrual and usage based on work schedules.
